channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ariki 4
channel.desc: Ariki is a revolutionary M?ori martial arts series where teams of rangatahi battle it out. Based on the ancestral art form, ARIKI was created by Te Whare T? Taua o Aotearoa. (R).

channel.title: Wairua (Mts)
channel.desc: The topic of wairua will be covered and the question will be answered from a M?ori perspective of ancient times, through to the present. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Vaa Voyagers Conquering The Hawaiki Nui
channel.desc: Follow the journey of the Senior Masters Men's waka ama team from Team Pineula, as they use the grueling Hawaiki Nui Va'a race to connect to their t?puna, their health and each other. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Rerenga K?tuku
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori presents Te Matatini o Te K?hui Maunga - the ultimate celebration of haka excellence. This is haka at its finest! (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Not Even
channel.desc: After eating fried chicken and crying in her car, Ma heads home. Together with her best friend Pua and cousin Liz, Ma gets ready for a Mean M?ori Mean costume party. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Queer and Here
channel.desc: Aniwa learns about the queer history of Aotearoa from non-binary trans masculine historian Will Hansen, then heads north to meet young trans wahine Phoenix Atkins and her family. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: End Of The Valley
channel.desc: A Shared Devotion: Ng?huia confirms her suspicions when an age-old vendetta resurfaces. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: Tipene gets a visit from Geo and Hemi; Te Ururangi doesn't know how to deal with bullies, Geo does and Thomas' life changes forever. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Time Tourists
channel.desc: Two tourists meet in an idyllic location. They hit it off, but quickly realise their relationship, like the rest of the world, doesn't have a future. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sixteen
channel.desc: With an unplanned pregnancy and a strained relationship with her mother, life is not the Kpop fantasy Yaejin dreams of. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. Six, once homeless herself, now a journalist, is our guide to the diverse, harsh and often tragic world of the people living on and around Karangahape Road. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Frontier
channel.desc: The newly acquired territory of California and the discovery of gold unleashes the largest migration in US history and ignites a vicious debate on slavery, culminating in the American Civil War. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: NEW: While at Waitangi the kids meet the Harmonic Resonators, who offered them a great opportunity. Balance and rest is a huge learning curve for the wh?nau. P?rina helps with her rongo? M?ori.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Imitation Game
channel.desc: PREMIERE: The story of Alan Turing, who helped crack Nazi codes during WWII but was later prosecuted for being gay.
